name: retrieve_compensation
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool co2_offset.
Tool description: GreenHouseGas/CO2 compensation as a service. Get 1kg/month for free to see how easy it is to implement.
API description: Fetches the full compensation details associated with a given ID using the specified RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The ID for which to retrieve the compensation details.
